units.report: CA Houston observes Japanese Float Plane at 79,84 near Iloilo

Morning Air attack on 16th Construction Regiment, at 88,56 (Chuhsien)
 
Weather in hex: Clear sky
 
Raid spotted at 19 NM, estimated altitude 17,000 feet.
Estimated time to target is 6 minutes
 
Japanese aircraft
      Ki-27b Nate x 8
      Ki-51 Sonia x 12
 
No Japanese losses
 
Aircraft Attacking:
      12 x Ki-51 Sonia bombing from 15000 feet
               Ground Attack:  4 x 50 kg GP Bomb
E7K2 Alf sighting report: 4 Allied ships at 134,114 near Likiep, speed 15, Moving East
